name: FA$T CRA$H
description:
RUNNER + TRIVIA/GAMESHOW

You have been chosen to be a contestant on FA💲T CA💲H!

Your task is to drive through the game show course while answering trivia questions. Questions pass by on billboards, you make your choice by driving in the lane that corresponds with your answer when the timer ends. If your answer is correct, you win ca💲h money! But beware; there are many obstacles in your way. Fortunately, your vehicle has been outfitted with a turbo la💲er cannon. Answer 10 questions, and take home your winnings! 💰💰💰

Controls:    
WASD & Arrows Keys = Movement    
Spacebar = Shoot & Intro Progression    
Left Mouse Click = Interact in Intro  

Our 11th Ludum Dare in a row!

Zamboni Macaroni! :beers: Kansas City, MO
